Package pizzapizza

Class Pizza

java.lang.Object
pizzapizza.Pizza
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuildYourOwn, Deluxe, Meatzza, Pepperoni, Seafood, Supreme
public abstract class Pizza extends Object
The abstract base class for Pizza in the PizzaPizza application. It includes properties such as toppings, size, sauce, and options for extra sauce and extra cheese.
Author:
Sibi suriyanarayan Tiruchirapalli venketaramani, Rahulraj Rajesh
